title: Tomb of Numerius Agrestinus Equitius Pulcher
description: A schola tomb at Pompeii located near the Porta Nocera necropolis. The inscription on the tomb's hemicycle honors Numerius Agrestinus Equitius Pulcher, a Roman who had an illustrious military career, including holding the role of praefectus of the Autrigones, an Iberian tribe.

properties.title: OSM location of Tomb of Numerius Agrestinus Equitius Pulcher
